name: Ncert Books & Solutions
description: Ncert Books & Solutions is a free app where you can download and read offline any Ncert Books and its solutions, Notes, previous year papers with solutions & watch best youtube video tutorials.  * RS Aggarwal , RD Sharma, HC Verma & All Exemplar solutions. * Sample Papers & Previous Year Papers of CBSE Board 10 & 12. * Ncert Notes of class 6 to 12. * Youtube video tutorials for class 1-12, Jee & Neet. * English & Hindi Ncert Books , Solutions & Notes . * All English Novels With Notes of classes 9 to12. * Easy to use user interface works smooth and Fast.  List of All NCERT Books in English & Hindi in Ncert Books & Solutions App. Class 1-5: Maths: Math Magic  English: Marigold  Hindi: Rimjhim  EVS: Looking Around , Aas pass  Class 6, 7, 8: Maths: Mathematics, Ganit , Mathematics Exemplar Science: Science , Vigyan , Science Exemplar  Hindi: Vasant Bhag , Durva Bhag, Bal Ram Katha , Bal Mahabharat  Katha , Bharat Ki Khoj  English: Honeysuckle, A
